title: Navigating Political Power in D.C.
description:
During his first two years in office, President Trump and the GOP had a strangle hold on power in Washington. That now changes. David Meyers speaks with Bloomberg Businessweek's Joshua Green on the problems facing both the Democrats and Republicans going into 2019. 
FOLLOW UP
 Joshua's latest column: Democrats Have Power Again. Can They Wield It Without Screwing Up?
You can follow Joshua at: @JoshuaGreen
----
 TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends!
